It sounds like you have an inconsistent install.
EXIT_OK is a constant recently added to org.eclipse.core.boot.IPlatformRunnable.
If this was incorrect in the builds, we would have gotten compile errors, and 
everyone would be seeing it.
You could end up in this situation by installing builds over each other.
Recommend always installing to a different directory.

As for the other problems, action sets have been changing around for the menu 
reorg, which would cause the log errors you're seeing.  
Suggest closing and reopening all perspectives. 
Or, exit, delete your workbench.xml file, and restart.  
This is under .metadata/plugins/org.eclipse.ui.
It contains your UI state (no workspace content).

Found the problem. For some reason, when I renamed c:\eclipse to
c:\eclipse.march for M4, Windows decided to change my shortcut. Pretty insidious
problem :(

Out of interest: should I be the one closing it, or is that up to you guys?

Jon

Generally the PR owner closes it (and I already have).
Thanks for the update.
